nodes.title: Dawn theme: hamburger menu & centered logo on desktop
nodes.excerpt: Learn how to enable Brooklyn’s hamburger menu for desktop devices.

nodes.title: How to add a premium slideshow section to any theme (without apps)
nodes.excerpt: Add a gorgeous slideshow section to any theme by simply copying and pasting one single file.

nodes.title: Removing blue box whenever tapping or clicking elements
nodes.excerpt: Quickly remove the blue background that appears on clickable elements. Works on every theme.

nodes.title: Minimal theme: show second image on hover
nodes.excerpt: Simple code to display a second image when hovering over a product’s thumbnail. Includes animations and other customizable features.

nodes.title: Simple & Debut theme: show “collection list” section’s title below the image
nodes.excerpt: Simple CSS code to move the collection’s title from inside of the image to below the image. Works on both the Simple and Debut theme.

nodes.title: Removing “return to cart” text from the checkout page
nodes.excerpt: Learn how to quickly get rid of the “return to cart” text that shows up on the checkout page.

nodes.title: Supply Theme: add a slideshow to your product pages
nodes.excerpt: Learn how to add a smooth slideshow to your product pages in just a few minutes. More than 20 customizable features built-in.

nodes.title: Adding an age verification popup without apps to any Shopify theme
nodes.excerpt: Effortlessly add an age verification popup to your Shopify theme. No apps required.

nodes.title: Brooklyn theme: hamburger menu on desktop
nodes.excerpt: Learn how to enable Brooklyn’s hamburger menu for desktop devices.

nodes.title: Brooklyn theme: sticky description for product page
nodes.excerpt: Brooklyn’s theme CSS code to make the description sticky on desktop devices

nodes.title: Debut theme: Add a lightbox zoom to product page images (mobile & desktop)
nodes.excerpt: Add a beautiful, smooth and minimalist lightbox zoom to the Debut theme product pages. Fully responsive, works on mobile and desktop.

nodes.title: Brooklyn Theme: enable slideshow & thumbnails for product page images
nodes.excerpt: Learn how to enable thumbnails, arrows, swiping and much more to your Brooklyn’s product page under 1 minute.

nodes.title: Add custom fonts to your Shopify theme [Complete Guide]
nodes.excerpt: Learn how to add custom fonts to your Shopify theme, step by step. Works with any web font.

nodes.title: Debut Theme: how to remove button hover animation
nodes.excerpt: Remove the hover animation for buttons on your Debut theme.

nodes.title: Minimal Theme: add a slideshow to your product pages
nodes.excerpt: Learn how to add a rich slideshow to your product pages in just a few minutes. More than 20 customizable features built-in.

nodes.title: “Read More” button on Debut theme product page
nodes.excerpt: Add a “read more” button to the description of your product pages.

nodes.title: How to change the header logo on your Shopify theme
nodes.excerpt: Change or update your theme’s logo. Works with any Shopify theme.

nodes.title: Enable mobile thumbnails for product pages on the Impulse Theme
nodes.excerpt: Display thumbnails on mobile devices at the product page for Archetype’s impulse theme.

nodes.title: Show second image on hover on the Debut Theme
nodes.excerpt: Learn how to display a second image when hovering over a product thumbnail. Includes animations and much more features.

nodes.title: How to upload images and files to your Shopify store
nodes.excerpt: Host images, videos and files in your Shopify store and generate an unique URL to use anywhere you wish.

nodes.title: Add a background image to Debut’s footer
nodes.excerpt: Use a background image in your Debut theme instead of an unique color.

nodes.title: Search for text across all files of your Shopify theme
nodes.excerpt: Easily find any text within the files of any of your Shopify themes. Regex support included.

nodes.title: How to rename the cart’s page checkout button on your Shopify theme
nodes.excerpt: Find out how to rename your cart’s page button text to freely A/B test what works better.

nodes.title: How to share an unpublished Shopify theme’s preview
nodes.excerpt: Privately and quickly share unpublished Shopify themes’ previews with your coworkers, developers or anyone else.

nodes.title: Fixing broken responsive images on Shopify
nodes.excerpt: Learn how to fix images being cut off on mobile.

nodes.title: Debut Theme: sticky navigation bar tutorial
nodes.excerpt: Add a sticky navigation bar to your theme in under one minute for free and effortlessly.

nodes.title: Hide price for sold out products on Shopify’s Debut Theme
nodes.excerpt: Hide the price of sold out products in your Debut theme in 30 seconds.

nodes.title: Shopify: Fix leverage Browser caching
nodes.excerpt: Improve your website’s performance by leveraging the browser’s cache.

nodes.title: Debut Theme: enable swiping to product page images
nodes.excerpt: Ever wanted to enable “swiping” on your Debut theme product images? Now it’s possible. And it takes less than 2 minutes.

nodes.title: Remove “Powered by Shopify” from footer
nodes.image_alt: Website with a red arrow pointing at the footer's text. The text says "Powered By Shopify".
nodes.excerpt: Learn how to remove the Shopify copyright text from your theme’s footer.

nodes.title: Remove shop name from your Shopify store’s title
nodes.excerpt: Although most Shopify themes automatically add your store’s name to the title it’s easy to get it removed.

nodes.title: Faster Shopify product pages with one line of code
nodes.image_alt: Man wearing a blue shirt with white dots typing on a laptop computer.
nodes.excerpt: Using images on your product description? This one tip is gonna be a game changer for you.

nodes.title: Debut theme: how to add a “name” field to the newsletter
nodes.excerpt: Add an additional “name” field to your Debut theme’s newsletter.
